messages.title: Fighting for real change for Sheffield Heeley
OUR COUNTRY NEEDS A STRONG OPPOSITION
CHANGE THE DIRECTION OF THE COUNTRY

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Retaining access to the Single Market
keyPolicies.policyDescription: 56% of Sheffield's exports go to Europe. That's why we believe that by retaining access to the Single Market, we can help protect local jobs and investment.
We know we need additional investment in our health and care services as a matter of urgency. The Liberal Democrats would give them the funds they need.
Local schools are under threat from a Conservative Party that has stopped listening to local people in Sheffield. Schools in Sheffield are set to lose £27m from their budgets.

issues.brexitEurope: Retaining access to the Single Market is vital to protect local jobs and investment.
issues.education: Opposing school cuts because Sheffield schools are set to lose £27m from their budgets.
issues.health: Standing up for the NHS with a promise for additional investment.
